entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023
